result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Orlando Lopez-Rodriguez

records.addlTxt: COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER.  Court takes no action as to bail.
Pre-trial conference on March 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision ( DISCHARGE) Report; filed.
Justice Point Violation (Missed Alternate Contact) Report received and filed.

Court ordered no contact with Marshall's, 3557 S. 27th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53221; Ross, 3533 S. 27th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53221
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Sworn as interpreter:  Daniel Lopez
Judy Veramende present for interview.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Orlando Lopez-Rodriguez in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Orlando Lopez-Rodriguez in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Orlando Lopez-Rodriguez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Case retabbed due to offense date in 22CM123.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
